features: 【GREAT STARTER SETS OF MAGNETIC TILES】Encourage STEM learning and creativity with Coodoo Magnetic Tiles Starter Pack! This pack features 40 magnetic tiles in a variety of shapes and rainbow colors. It is the perfect option to start your Magnetic Tiles collection, build big and gain confidence in magnetic tile play. A carrying bag is included for easy, stress-free storage. It also allows kids to take the learning tiles with them easily from room to room.

【COMPATIBLE WITH LEADING BRANDS】Coodoo Magnetic Tiles have a 3 inches base measurement. They’re the perfect size for little hands to grip, pick up, and place shapes. Standard sizes make it compatible with other leading brands, you can expand and complement your existing tiles with this pack to collect every shape in every color! More tiles, more fun.

【STEM MONTESSORI & SENSORY TOYS】Magnetic tiles are open-ended toy that grows with your child. They're more than just for building. While having fun and being creative, kids are also using magnetic tiles to develop STEM-related skills such as pattern recognition, magnetic principles, problem-solving, etc. These tiles are also great as sensory toys for enhanced sensory play. So, what are you waiting for? Get Coodoo magnetic tiles today and start exploring all the different ways to use them!

【PUTTING SAFETY FIRST】Safety is and always will be our top priority. Coodoo magnetic tiles are made of safe and durable Food-grade ABS plastic. Smooth surface and round edge design won't scratch or hurt little hands. The magnetic blocks are sealed to keep the tiles from breaking or swallowing. With a cross-fix design, our tiles are stronger and won't crack as easily as other tiles, allowing them to last for years.

【PERFECT LEARNING TOYS GIFTS】Perfect for a collaborative group activity or school classrooms, preschool classrooms, kindergarten classrooms, outdoors toys, and teacher supplies classroom supplies. Can be connected without limit to stimulate children's creativity. In a word, it's a fantastic kids' toy for toddlers, preschoolers, and school-age children, even teen boys and girls like it. Perfect holiday kids toys gift for birthday, Children's day, Kindergarten Graduation Gifts, Christmas etc.
body.description: Looking for an easy and educational activity to do with your little ones? Look no further! Try our Coodoo Magnetic Tiles builds at home! Engage your little one in hours of open-ended imaginative play with magnetic tiles! Magnetic tiles can help to develop: Concentration and focus Critical thinking Problem-solving skills Creativity Geometry skills Patterning skills Coordination More to explore...

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Coodoo Coodoo toys are in accordance with international safety standards, and will be your wonderful investment for kids that will last for many, many years. At Coodoo we strive to provide quality, fun, and educational toys, games at great prices. When happiness and joy come with us, we gotta the one that you always looking for. Looking for an easy and educational activity to do with your little ones? Look no further! Try our Coodoo Magnetic Tiles builds at home! Engage your little one in hours of open-ended imaginative play with magnetic tiles! Magnetic tiles can help to develop: Concentration and focus Critical thinking Problem-solving skills Creativity Geometry skills Patterning skills Coordination More to explore...

Make Learning Fun Use our magnetic tiles in different ways to teach kids color mixing, help kids learn about magnets, build letters and numbers, teach shapes, count, make art, and construct buildings. Kids will stay busy all day with these exciting ideas for playing with magnetic tiles, no matter what kind you have. Make Designs on Fridge A fun filled project on how to decorate the fridge with magnetic tiles while mom cooks. Kids accompany you constructively as you prepare the meal. DIY Magnetic Tile Puzzles Make your own little puzzle challenges for the children by drawing around different formations and seeing if they can match the tiles up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unleash Imagination with Magnetic Tiles Kids STEM Magnet Toys!
reviews.reviewText: Rating: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐The Magnetic Tiles Kids STEM Magnet Toys are a dynamic and educational addition to playtime, inspiring creativity and learning in young minds.Pros: 1. STEM Learning: These toys are designed to stimulate STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics) learning in a fun and interactive way, making them valuable for children aged 3 and up. 2. Versatile Building: The magnetic tiles are versatile and can be used to create a wide range of structures, fostering creativity and problem-solving skills. 3. Sensory Development: They promote sensory development, encouraging fine motor skills and an understanding of spatial concepts. 4. Safe and Durable: These toys are built with safety in mind, and the high-quality materials ensure they can withstand the enthusiastic play of young children. 5. Gender-Neutral: Suitable for both boys and girls, these toys offer an inclusive and engaging play experience for all young minds.Cons: 1. Small Parts: As with any small toy, parents and caregivers should be cautious with younger children who might be prone to putting small items in their mouths. Adult supervision is advised.In summary, the Magnetic Tiles Kids STEM Magnet Toys are a fantastic gift for kids aged 3 and up. They combine STEM learning with imaginative play, enabling children to explore engineering concepts in a hands-on and enjoyable way. These versatile tiles promote creativity, sensory development, and problem-solving, and their safety and durability make them a worthwhile investment for parents and caregivers. While small parts require supervision for younger children, the educational and creative value of these toys is highly recommended for those seeking toys that are both entertaining and enriching.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great starter gift for magnetiles
reviews.reviewText: This is such a fun and great product at a good price! I think I was just relying on the pictures for how many came in a container but I was expecting more tiles..but we now know my daughter (and the adults) love working with these and will continue to buy more! It was probably good we didn't get very many incase she didn't enjoy them like she does. Great starter pack for sure!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Excellent quality, easy to use and easy to order. My daughter loves to play with them.They come with a bag to store them, but I preferred to buy a plastic box to store them

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun and educational
reviews.reviewText: My kiddos absolutely love these! They even use them at their school (that’s where we learned of these). You can basically make whatever your littles minds cand imagine while also helping with there fine motor skills and much more. The different colors and shapes definitely help my toddler learn. These are of great quality and have lasted for years. We wanted to add more to what they already have and the kids are never disappointed when they get these. They came with a nice carrying bag and are great for car trips/airplane trips as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great building toy
reviews.reviewText: I was hesitant to purchase something other than Magna Tiles, but these were significantly cheaper. They seem just as good, and are the exact same size, so they work well with the Magna Tiles we already had. I would recommend buying two sets (or a larger set) in order to build something bigger. Good value for price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought these magnetic tiles for my 6-year-old son and he loves them. He can build all kinds of shapes and structures with them, and they are very durable and easy to clean. The magnets are strong enough to hold the tiles together, but not too hard to pull apart. The colors are bright and attractive, and the tiles come in different sizes and shapes. The package also includes a booklet with some ideas for building projects. I think these tiles are great for stimulating his creativity and imagination, as well as developing his spatial and motor skills. He plays with them every day and never gets bored. I highly recommend these magnetic tiles for kids who love to build and create.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Huge hit at the holidays
reviews.reviewText: These tiles were fun for kids and parents, alike. This product even came with a bag to keep the tiles in. After gifting a set, my friend bought two more because she wanted to be able to build bigger creations with her child. The only downside with this set is that it is not very big, so you may want to consider purchasing more than one set or a larger set if you have an older child that will be using the tiles. These are great for children ages 4 and up. An 8-year-old will have as much fun playing with them as a five-year-old. Great gift idea!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a fun toy!
reviews.reviewText: My son loves these tiles. He plays pretty hard and the tiles have held up! Very sturdy. The colors are vibrant and look cool when placed near a light or window. This is a toy I enjoy playing with as well!
